input.sentences: the opening band went on stage to a roaring crowd . you can tell that the crowd is excited !
the opening act was very entertaining . they really pumped up the audience for the headliner .
this was the vehicle the headliner band came in ! this thing was huge !
we managed to get an aerial shot of the stage and crowd . the crowd was small but powerful !
the show was very entertaining to watch ! all the performers were talented and the crowd was happy !
output.sentences: All the performers and the crowd were having a great time.
Chaos broke out at the concert.
Everything was back to normal and the concert ended strong that night.
